structure.unit: A NATURAL RESOURCES SEVERANCE AND PROCESSING TAXES

law.catch_line: Limitation on tax on limestone used in manufacture of cement.
law.text: Notwithstanding any other statutory provisions, the tax imposed by KRS 143A.020 applicable to limestone actually used in the manufacture of cement by an integrated miner and manufacturer of cement shall be limited to fourteen cents ($0.14) per ton of limestone mined in Kentucky and actually used in the manufacture of cement.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 3, effective August 1, 2000.
